projects.name: Multi-Region Disaster Recovery
projects.challenge: Global e-commerce platformu için %99.99 uptime garantisi

components: Route53 health checks ile automatic failover

lessons_learned: Cross-region networking her zaman test edilmeli (latency surprises)
Terraform state locking S3+DynamoDB ile şart (conflict prevention)
Spot instance termination handler her zaman implement et

projects.name: Kubernetes Cost Optimization

implementation: VPA (Vertical Pod Autoscaler) ile resource optimization
Spot instances for stateless workloads (%70 of cluster)

lessons_learned: VPA ve HPA birlikte kullanma - conflict yaratıyor
Karpenter, Cluster Autoscaler'dan çok daha efficient
Spot termination handler critical - graceful shutdown şart
Monitoring without action waste - alerting + automation gerekli

projects.name: Serverless Data Pipeline
projects.challenge: Günlük 10TB log processing, cost-effective ve scalable

flow: S3 event → Lambda trigger → initial processing
Step Functions orchestration for complex workflows
Glue ETL jobs for heavy transformations

lessons_learned: Lambda cold start sorunu - provisioned concurrency gerekli critical path'lerde
Step Functions state machine design kritik - retry/error handling
S3 partitioning stratejisi query performance'ı 10x artırıyor
CloudWatch Insights > Splunk for serverless debugging

cost_optimization: Reserved instances sadece predictable workload'lar için
Spot instances where possible, always with fallback
CloudWatch Logs retention policy - 30 days enough usually
security: Least privilege principle - start minimal, expand as needed
VPC endpoints for AWS services (no internet gateway needed)
Secrets Manager for credentials, parameter store for config
GuardDuty + Security Hub for threat detection
observability: Alerting fatigue real - tune thresholds carefully
